thread.title: Erika

author: Erika
title: Erika
text:
I was cleaning out dvds, cds, and books that I hadn't used in years. I came across eagle saver and decided to give it a shot. The Quote: they gave me for my items was more than reasonable, considering I was just going to get rid of the items anyway. I was emailed my shipping label, I dropped the boxes off and two days later I received an email stating that they received my package. I was paid the very next day, the exact amount that they Quote: d me!
I have told all of my friends and family about how great this site it and will continue to do so!!
